item.title: Consuming APIs with Redux, the Shasta way
item.description: Since React is just the view layer of your front-end stack, the community had to provide the solutions for the remaining problems. Right now there seems to be a consensus for the best libraries. The recommended stack is: Building: Webpack and babel Managing your UI state: Redux and ImmutableJS Routing: React-router (ahem!) But there seems to be lots of options to connect Redux to your API. Yesterday, I decided to see what Shasta had in store for us.
